Stay up to date with regular announcements by email.

Your privacy is important to us. We will not share your information.

We respectfully acknowledge that the Berkeley Art Center is on the traditional native land of Muwekma Ohlone people. As guests, we are committed to being good stewards of our historic place and the vital role we play for the citizens of the Bay Area. To learn more about how to support East Bay indigenous communities, please visit www.sogoreate-landtrust.org.

Thanks! Well be in touch soon.
